forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms early, overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms this evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early changing to snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early changing to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 41F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 18F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
